mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usertable (username, psw, email,state_type, integral,u_image) VALUES (#{username},#{psw},#{email},#{state_type},#{integral},#{u_image})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM favorite WHERE uid=#{uid} and gid=#{gid}
mapper.select: select * from usertable where username = #{username} and psw = #{psw} and state_type != 1
select uid from usertable where username=#{name};

SELECT g.g_attribute as attribute , g.image_zhanshi as img , g.g_name as `name`, g.g_price AS price , g.g_id AS id FROM favorite f LEFT JOIN usertable u ON u.uid=f.uid LEFT JOIN goods g ON f.gid=g.g_id
SELECT u.uid AS id, u.username AS `name`, u.email AS email, u.state_type AS `status`, u.authority AS authority FROM usertable u
mapper.update: UPDATE usertable SET authority=1 WHERE uid=#{0}
UPDATE usertable SET authority=0 WHERE uid=#{0}
UPDATE usertable SET state_type=1 WHERE uid=#{0}
